first_para: David William St. John Heath CBE (born 16 March 1954) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Somerton and Frome and was the Minister of State for Agriculture and Food. In October 2013 after being removed from his ministerial post in a reshuffle, he announced his intention to step down at the next UK General Election.

full.extract:
David William St. John Heath CBE (born 16 March 1954) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Somerton and Frome and was the Minister of State for Agriculture and Food. In October 2013 after being removed from his ministerial post in a reshuffle, he announced his intention to step down at the next UK General Election.
^ "House of Commons - The Register of Members' Financial Interests - Part 2: Part 2". parliament.uk. 
^
full.title: David Heath (politician)
